description.overview: Body represents your physical vitality, motivation to act, and overall health and wellbeing.
description.detailed: This group combines three physical dimensions: Vitality (physical energy and stamina), Drive (motivation to take action and pursue goals), and Wellness (daily health routines and work-life balance). Together they show your overall physical and practical state. High scores mean you have energy, feel motivated, and your routines are supporting you. Low scores suggest exhaustion, low motivation, or neglected self-care.

quiet.challenging: Your body needs rest and recovery - honor low energy
quiet.mixed: Physical activity is minimal - conserve energy
quiet.harmonious: Your body is peacefully resting - deep recovery happening

mild.challenging: Energy is building slowly - be patient with your body
mild.mixed: Gentle physical energy present - light activity favored
mild.harmonious: Your body has easy energy - movement feels natural

moderate.challenging: Physical resistance present - work with your body not against it
moderate.mixed: Physical energy requires effort but is available
moderate.harmonious: Strong steady energy - good for sustained activity

high.challenging: Physical demands are intense - manage energy carefully
high.mixed: Drive is high but requires management - channel wisely
high.harmonious: Peak physical performance - maximize activity windows

extreme.challenging: Physical exhaustion or rebuilding - prioritize rest and recovery
extreme.mixed: Maximum physical output - powerful but unsustainable
extreme.harmonious: Optimal vitality and drive - exceptional physical capacity
